climbs.name: X Marks The Spot
climbs.fa: Paul Bucher, Drake Buckingham, John Sevier

content.description: Climbs the right side of the X. Steep but short crux. A little dusty, but it's the desert and thats part of the fun.
content.protection: 2 each, fingers, hands, fist. 1 med hex or large stopper
content.location: The big X in the middle of the south side of the formation.

content.description: Way cool old school route. Do not know the F.A. party or the "real" name of the route and tower.
content.protection: mostly a bolt and rivet ladder. a small rack to back it up.
content.location: start on the south west side in a small corner to a ledge with an old pin then over and up the middle of the north face. bomber new bolt anchor.

climbs.name: New School Route
climbs.fa: Paul Bucher, John Sevier, Drake Buckingham

content.description: A really cool "easy" route with only a few moves at the grade. Great route for the average joe breaking into desert towers. Be sure not to miss the awesome cam placement in that pocket below the summit. So cool. Great location. Great views. A little runout, but not bad. Very well protected.
content.protection: 2 quick draws, 1 #6 trango flex cam, 1 #7 trango flex cam, 1 optional #8 trango flex cam.
content.location: The right side of the formation (as viewed from the south). Bomber new bolt anchors.
